title: Kitsutsuki Tanteidokoro (Woodpecker Detective's Office)
synopsis: A ghost was seen on the 12th floor of the Asakusa Juunikai building. A newspaper article featuring the sighting brought together Takuboku Ishikawa, who runs a private detective agency to support his family, and his assistant Kyosuke Kindaichi to solve the case.
characters: ['Ishikawa, Takuboku', 'Kindaichi, Kyousuke', 'Akutagawa, Ryuunosuke', 'Wakayama, Bokusui', 'Hagiwara, Sakutarou', 'Hirai, Tarou', 'Nomura, Kodou', 'Yoshii, Isamu']
voices: ['Asanuma, Shintaro', 'Sakurai, Takahiro', 'Hayashi, Yukiya', 'Furukawa, Makoto', 'Umehara, Yuuichirou', 'Ono, Kensho', 'Tsuda, Kenjirou', 'Saitou, Souma']
